amendment.description: Amendment allows local governments to use local law enforcement block grants to enhance security measures at any facility or location the local government considers to be at risk for crime.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 1 as printed in the Congressional Record of Feb. 7, 1995) to permit recipients to use their block grants to enhance security measures at facilities and locations considered to be especially "at risk" to crime.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
